div.span: Value Living In the heart of Costa Mesa there is eaves South Coast – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality Costa Mesa apartments with a few little extras, like well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances and wood plank flooring in kitchens and entryways. In other words, our apartments in Costa Mesa offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? Costa Mesa Apartments by eaves You deserve a comfortable, welcoming apartment to come home to while living in Costa Mesa. At eaves South Coast, that's exactly what you'll get. Located on Paularino Avenue, our Orange County apartment community is conveniently located near the 55, 405 and 73 freeways, as well as John Wayne Airport. Check out delectable local restaurants like Memphsis Soul Case & Bar, Pinot Provence, and Sutra Longue to sample some delectable cuisines, or just spend a day relaxing by hanging out at Fairview Park. Costa Mesa Apartment Community Becoming a member of eaves South Coast gives you instant access to a wide variety of perks designed to make your life more comfortable. This includes free access to our fitness center and sparkling swimming pool. You also have access to a sport court and lounge space with pool tables, kitchen and gaming room. Our professional staff ensures that any maintenance issue that may arise is efficiently taken care of. Contact us to schedule an appointment and learn more about your new apartment in Cost Mesa today.

div.h2: this is the real deal. this is eaves.

a.div: Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment. It means having a respectful, friendly staff that you know you can depend on when you need them. Giving you one less thing to worry about and one more way to feel at home in your new community. That’s eaves.
We know you value convenience. That’s why all of our locations are also carefully selected to put you within reach of local shopping, restaurants and public transportation.

You made a promise to yourself to live within your means. That doesn't mean living without. Take advantage of our special resident discounts, early deposit refund program, and longer lease term options.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

a.div: Don’t worry, we’re best-friendly. See what we do to take pet-friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

div.p: Moving can be stressful, but we’re here to welcome you home. Connect with one of our team members to learn more.

li.a: Do Not Sell My Personal Information

better than you expected.","description":"Value Living In the heart of Costa Mesa there is eaves South Coast – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality Costa Mesa apartments with a few little extras, like well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances and wood plank flooring in kitchens and entryways. In other words, our apartments in Costa Mesa offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? Costa Mesa Apartments by eaves You deserve a comfortable, welcoming apartment to come home to while living in Costa Mesa. At eaves South Coast, that's exactly what you'll get. Located on Paularino Avenue, our Orange County apartment community is conveniently located near the 55, 405 and 73 freeways, as well as John Wayne Airport. Check out delectable local restaurants like Memphsis Soul Case & Bar, Pinot Provence, and Sutra Longue to sample some delectable cuisines, or just spend a day relaxing by hanging out at Fairview Park. Costa Mesa Apartment Community Becoming a member of eaves South Coast gives you instant access to a wide variety of perks designed to make your life more comfortable. This includes free access to our fitness center and sparkling swimming pool. You also have access to a sport court and lounge space with pool tables, kitchen and gaming room. Our professional staff ensures that any maintenance issue that may arise is efficiently taken care of. Contact us to schedule an appointment and learn more about your new apartment in Cost Mesa today.","previewWordCount":50},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","id":"f0fS8ijfbEUNyd","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"imgSrc":"https://cloudfront-us-east-1.images.arcpublishing.com/avalonbay/XIQXOTIGG5DALHKPSHMLU3N5DY.jpg","furnishedDescription":"Furnished+ offers all the essential items you need to move in plus conveniences like flexible lease terms, included utilities, and immediate access to highspeed Wi-Fi and cable TV."},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","props":{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","id":"c0fLIjdpbEUNfr","customFields":{"title":"this is the real deal. \nthis is eaves."},"displayProperties":{}},"children":[{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityBrandCard","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityBrandCard","id":"f0fhSfiibEUN6k","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"title":"our staff.","link":"/","description":"Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment.
